meanings.definition: A type of Japanese comic or graphic novel.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading mangas in my free time.
meanings.sent2: She has a collection of mangas on her bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The library's new collection of mangas made everyone excited.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she delved into the colorful world of mangas.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant illustrations in mangas bring stories to life.

meanings.sent1: Her dress had beautiful lace mangas.
meanings.sent2: He rolled up his mangas to wash his hands.
meanings.sent3: The oversized mangas of his sweater made him look funny.
meanings.sent4: She hugged herself, feeling the warmth of her mangas.
meanings.sent5: The mangas fluttered in the wind as she ran.

meanings.sent1: The market was selling fresh mangas.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of mangas for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the jungle loved to feast on mangas.
meanings.sent4: The scent of ripe mangas filled the air.
meanings.sent5: Juicy mangas are a refreshing treat on a hot day.
